snippet: The two men, charged with “terrorist conspiracy to commit crimes against people,” are suspected of links to Amedy Coulibaly, who attacked a kosher grocery in Paris.
abstract: French prosecutors initiate formal investigation of two men, identified only by first names, who are believed to have ties to Amedy Coulibaly, one of three gunmen involved in terrorist assault on a kosher market in Paris.
lead_paragraph: The two men, charged with “terrorist conspiracy to commit crimes against people,” are suspected of links to Amedy Coulibaly, who attacked a kosher grocery in Paris.

headline.main: France Charges 2 Suspected of Ties to Gunman in Attacks
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; France: 2 Charged in Terrorism Case
